text: Fire detection systems. Each OSV must be fitted with an automatic fire detection and alarm system covering machinery, accommodation, service spaces, control stations, and cargo pump-rooms.
Discharge of oil or oily waste into navigable waters or the contiguous zone is prohibited except under specific conditions and must be reported immediately to the National Response Center.
Each vessel must carry survival craft sufficient for 100 percent of persons on board, including automatically inflatable life rafts equipped with emergency equipment.
